ome.smuggler.core.io.crypto

Class CryptoSinkWriter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ome.smuggler.core.io.crypto.CryptoSinkWriter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SinkWriter<T,java.io.OutputStream>

    public class CryptoSinkWriter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements SinkWriter<T,java.io.OutputStream>
    An encryption filter that wraps an underlying SinkWriter w to encrypt whatever w writes to the sink OutputStream.

      • CryptoSinkWriter

                        SinkWriter<T,java.io.OutputStream> writer)
        Creates a new instance.
        Parameters:
        crypto - factory to create encryption ciphers.

        Specified by:
